documentation.description: Update application specific data for the user profile of the given unique ID.

uid.description: An unique identifier of the user profile

if_seq_no.description: only perform the update operation if the last operation that has changed the document has the specified sequence number

if_primary_term.description: only perform the update operation if the last operation that has changed the document has the specified primary term

refresh.description: If `true` (the default) then refresh the affected shards to make this operation visible to search, if `wait_for` then wait for a refresh to make this operation visible to search, if `false` then do nothing with refreshes.
